content: वान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Blown. {@--2@} Dried(by wind) dried up. {@--3@} Belonging to a forest. --नं {@--1@} Dry or dried fruit ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also). {@--2@} Blowing. {@--3@} Living. {@--4@} Rolling, moving, (as of waters &c.). {@--5@} A perfume, fragrance. {@--6@} A number of groves or thickets. {@--7@} Weaving. {@--8@} A mat of straw. {@--9@} A hole in the wall of a house.
